main event: A mysterious cigar-shaped object was spotted in the sky near St. Louis, Illinois on July 18, 1954.
interesting points: The object appeared to be traveling at a high speed, estimated at around 30,000 feet in altitude.
The object was observed for 3 to 5 minutes before disappearing.
The report includes detailed meteorological information, such as wind speeds and cloud cover.
The report mentions the presence of two F-86 aircraft in the area at the time of the sighting.
The conclusion of the report is that the sighting was likely a balloon or aircraft, but the object's identity remained unknown.
